targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN EXISTS (
      SELECT 1
      FROM trivy_results tr
      JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id
      WHERE br.id = $build_id
        AND tr.severity IN ('HIGH','CRITICAL')
    ) 
    THEN 0 
    ELSE 1 
  END AS status;

SELECT br.tag 
FROM build_reports br
WHERE br.id= '$build_id'

SELECT br.id 
FROM build_reports br
WHERE br.id= '$build_id'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_critical
FROM trivy_results tr
WHERE tr.build_id = '$build_id'
  AND tr.is_exception=1;

SELECT 
    br.timestamp AS time,
    tr.severity AS metric,
    COUNT(*) AS value
FROM trivy_results tr
JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.id = '$build_id' AND tr.is_exception=0
GROUP BY br.timestamp, tr.severity

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    br.timestamp AS time,
    'CRITICAL' AS metric,   -- Force secrets into CRITICAL bucket
    COUNT(*) AS value
FROM trivy_secrets ts
JOIN build_reports br ON ts.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.id = '$build_id'
  AND ts.severity = 'CRITICAL'
GROUP BY br.timestamp

ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT 
    br.id AS build_id,
    br.image,
    br.tag,
    br.ci_url,
    br.timestamp,

   -- Count vulnerabilities by severity
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE tr.severity = 'CRITICAL' AND tr.is_exception=0) AS critical_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE tr.severity = 'HIGH' AND tr.is_exception=0)     AS high_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE tr.severity = 'MEDIUM' AND tr.is_exception=0)   AS medium_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE tr.severity = 'LOW' AND tr.is_exception=0)      AS low_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE tr.severity IS NULL OR tr.severity = '' AND tr.is_exception=0) AS unknown_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE tr.is_exception=1)  AS exception_count,

    -- Total vulnerabilities and secrets
    COUNT(DISTINCT tr.id) AS total_vulnerabilities,
    COUNT(DISTINCT ts.id) AS total_secrets

FROM build_reports br
LEFT JOIN trivy_results tr ON tr.build_id = br.id
LEFT JOIN trivy_secrets ts ON ts.build_id = br.id

WHERE br.id = '$build_id'
GROUP BY br.id, br.image, br.tag, br.ci_url, br.timestamp;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_critical
FROM trivy_results tr
WHERE tr.build_id = '$build_id'
  AND tr.severity = 'CRITICAL' AND tr.is_exception=0;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_critical
FROM trivy_results tr
WHERE tr.build_id = '$build_id'
  AND tr.severity = 'HIGH' AND tr.is_exception=0;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_critical
FROM trivy_results tr
WHERE tr.build_id = '$build_id'
  AND tr.severity = 'MEDIUM' AND tr.is_exception=0;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_critical
FROM trivy_results tr
WHERE tr.build_id = '$build_id'
  AND tr.severity = 'LOW' AND tr.is_exception=0;

SELECT 
    ts.target AS file_name,
    ts.rule_id,
    ts.category,
    ts.severity,
    ts.title,
    ts.match,
    ts.timestamp
FROM trivy_secrets ts
WHERE ts.build_id = '$build_id'
ORDER BY ts.timestamp DESC;

SELECT 
    tr.vuln_id,
    tr.pkg_name,
    tr.installed,
    tr.fixed,
    tr.severity,
    tr.status,
    tr.primary_url,
    tr.timestamp
FROM trivy_results tr
JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id
WHERE tr.build_id = '$build_id' AND tr.is_exception=0
ORDER BY tr.severity DESC, tr.vuln_id;

SELECT 
    tr.vuln_id,
    tr.pkg_name,
    tr.installed,
    tr.fixed,
    tr.severity,
    tr.status,
    tr.primary_url,
    tr.timestamp
FROM trivy_results tr
JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id
WHERE tr.build_id = '$build_id' AND tr.is_exception=1
ORDER BY tr.severity DESC, tr.vuln_id;

SELECT br.ai_recommendation
FROM build_reports br
WHERE br.id= '$build_id'
